youtube.description:
Burak of Ark presents: A new privacy-preserving second-layer scaling solution is on the horizon. Learn about the protocol specs such as txlocks, ATLCs, and swap factories.

Speaker Twitter: https ://twitter.com/brqgoo
Speaker website: https://buraks.blog

btcpp website: https ://btcplusplus.dev/
btcpp twitter: https ://twitter.com/btcplusplus

Recorded at the Palmer Events Center, 29 April 2023 in Austin, Texas.
